DataElement.preferredName: CoPaQ Average Time per Week Caregiver or Companion Spends Performing Tasks Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number representing the average time per week that patient's caregiver or companion spends performing tasks.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cost for Patients Questionnaire Average Time per Week Caregiver or Companion Spends Performing Tasks
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess an individual's expenses as a result of their state of health. It includes questions about out-of-pocket costs, time required for travel or for booking medical services, and loss of income.:A question about the average time a caregiver or companion spends performing various tasks per week.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Value expressed as a number with 3 total digits and no decimals.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: No Value Exists:No Value Exists:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: What is the estimated average time per week your caregiver or the person accompanying you spends performing various tasks?
